ygData.subject: Another Question....
ygData.msgSnippet: This might be a silly question for those of you who are experts at playing Everquest, but, I still have to ask it.  What does it mean when a person shouts
ygData.messageBody:
This might be a silly question for those of you who are experts at
playing Everquest, but, I still have to ask it. What does it mean
when a person shouts "looking for group check"? I've been playing
for just over a year and have never quite figured out if this means
that the person is looking for new group members or if they are
acoounting for the members that are already in the group. Just a
question from someone who simply does not know.

Thanks
